name: Flying Shield
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

special_abilities.desc: The shield is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the shield must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.
special_abilities.name: Antimagic Susceptibility

special_abilities.desc: While the shield remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal shield.
special_abilities.name: False Appearance

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Shield Bash

actions.desc: Provide +1 AC to one medium creature or smaller within 5 ft. of the shield until the start of the shield's next turn. A creature may only benefit from one shield guard at a time.
actions.name: Shield Guard

name: Sentient Rock
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 7

special_abilities.desc: While the shield remains motionless and isn�t flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal shield.
special_abilities.name: False Appearance

special_abilities.desc: An adjacent friendly creature with a minimum Strength of 10 can use its action to throw the rock. The throw is a ranged weapon attack with finesse, reaches 30 ft., hits one target, and deals 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage.
special_abilities.name: Fling

special_abilities.desc: The rock has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.
special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Tackle

name: Shadow Sphere
damage_resistances: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

special_abilities.desc: The shadow sphere can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
special_abilities.name: Amorphous

special_abilities.desc: While in bright light or sunlight, the shadow sphere has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. Additionally, the shadow sphere takes 1 (1d2) damage every turn.
special_abilities.name: Light Vulnerability

special_abilities.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow sphere has resistance to damage that isn�t force, psychic, or radiant.
special_abilities.name: Living Shadow

special_abilities.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow sphere can take the Hide action as a bonus action.
special_abilities.name: Shadow Stealth

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Shadow Lunge

name: Phobic Spider
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 80 ft., passive Perception 10

special_abilities.desc: The spider has +1 to hit and +1 poison and web DC against creatures who are afraid of spiders, or +1 to hit against creatures who are afraid of bugs in general.
special_abilities.name: Phobic Origin

special_abilities.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
special_abilities.name: Spider Climb

special_abilities.desc: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
special_abilities.name: Web Sense

special_abilities.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.
special_abilities.name: Web Walker

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 11 (2d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: +6 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. 	extit{Hit:} The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 14 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 10; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).
actions.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.desc: The knight has +1 to hit, +1 grapple DC, and +1d8 grapple damage against creatures who are afraid of being bound or captured.
special_abilities.name: Phobic Origin

special_abilities.desc: The knight's weapons are enchanted with modified versions of the chain extension and projection enchantments
special_abilities.name: Runic Weapons

actions.desc: The knight makes four melee attacks, grapples, or any combination of the two.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Chain Slash

actions.desc: The knight extends its chains to wrap around one target within a 15 ft. range. The target must make a Dexterity (Acrobatics) check with DC 17 or become grappled. A grappled target takes 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage at the end of the knight's turn. The knight may grapple up to 4 targets at once, and may move a grappled targets anywhere within range as a melee attack or as a bonus action.
actions.name: Grappling Chains

actions.desc: The knight creates several projections of its chains and uses them to unleash a flurry of attacks around itself. All creatures within a 30-foot radius of the knight must make a Dexterity saving throw with DC 19. A creature takes 38 (4d10 + 16) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. A creature currently being grappled by the knight automatically fails the saving throw.
actions.name: Flurry of Chains (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.desc:
The corpsebringer is a 7th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). The corpsebringer has the following wizard spells prepared:

- Cantrips (at will): chill touch, minor illusion, poison spray, ray of frost
- 1st level (4 slots): chromatic orb, detect magic, false life, shield
- 2nd level (3 slots): acid arrow, blindness/deafness, hold person
- 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, counterspell, hypnotic pattern
- 4th level (1 slot): blight
special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting

special_abilities.desc: The corpsebringer has +1 spell save DC and +1 to hit against creatures who are afraid of undead.
special_abilities.name: Phobic Origin

special_abilities.desc: The corpsebringer can command nearby zombies and skeletons at will.
special_abilities.name: Undead Commander

actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Necrotic Touch

actions.desc: The corpsebringer summons 1d4 + 1 zombies or skeletons from the ground anywhere within a 60 foot radius. An existing corpse or pile of bones is not required to perform this action. Any zombies or skeletons summoned this way turn to ash several minutes after the corpsebringer is defeated.
actions.name: Rising Dead (Recharge 3-4)

reactions.desc: When a creature the corpsebringer can see targets it with an attack, the corpsebringer chooses a zombie or skeleton within 5 feet of it. The two swap places, and the chosen undead becomes the target instead.
reactions.name: Redirect Attack
